entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trois-Pistoles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
